data.title: Alpina Autos y Vinos â€“ BMW CLUBS LATIN AMERICAN FEDERATION
data.text:
In addition to the Alpina's Plant in Buchloe, inside the same industrial complex, there is the building of Alpina Wines.

Alpina Wines stocks more than 1 million bottles of wine and is considered one of the world's finest wine traders.

Watch below the presentation video where Burkard Bovensiepen talks about his second passion, after Alpina Autos, his wine company: Alpina Wines

Video Presentation Alpina Wines

In the video above you can see your personal cellar (Cave) located in the basement of the Alpina Wines building.

For over 35 years, and with the same fervor with which they produce their cars, Alpina Wines has invested in famous and carefully chosen wines, acquired directly from selected winemakers.

The range of wines is unique in many ways, made up of rare vintages and excellent wines, representing exceptional value in relation to inherent quality.
